alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Clay; Duval; Nassau; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued January 04 at 3:13PM EST until January 04 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 13, PREVIOUSLY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON, IS NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST FLORIDA BAKER CLAY DUVAL NASSAU IN NORTHERN FLORIDA BRADFORD UNION IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST GEORGIA CAMDEN CHARLTON GLYNN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AMELIA CITY, ARLINGTON, BELLAIR, COUNTRY CLUB ESTATE, DOCK JUNCTION, DOCTORS INLET, DOVER BLUFF, DUNGENESS, FERNANDINA BEACH, FOLKSTON, GLYNN HAVEN, HILLIARD, HOMELAND, JACKSONVILLE, JEKYLL ISLAND, KINGS FERRY, KINGSLAND, LAKE BUTLER, LAKESIDE, MACCLENNY, MIDDLEBURG, NEW RIVER, NORMANDY, OCEANWAY, OLUSTEE, ORANGE PARK, ORTEGA, RACE POND, RATLIFF, RIVERSIDE, SAN MARCO, SEA ISLAND, ST. GEORGE, ST. SIMONS, STARKE, STEPHEN FOSTER STATE PARK, THALMANN, WINOKUR, AND YULEE.
